    - [Rates](https://cityofstantontx.com/rates/)
    - [CCR 2024](https://cityofstantontx.com/wp-content/uploads/2025/06/2024-CCRPDF.pdf)
    - [CCR 2023](https://cityofstantontx.com/wp-content/uploads/2024/06/CCR-2023.pdf)
    - [CCR 2022](https://cityofstantontx.com/CCRStantonTX2022.pdf)

#### **The Water Department is open Monday thru Friday from 8:00 a.m. to 5:00 p.m. and closed for lunch from 12:00 p.m. to 1:00 p.m. If you have an emergency during weekends or after hours, call the Martin County Sheriffs Department at (432)756-3336 and ask for the City employee that is on call. The water clerk is Lois Jenkins.**

|  |  |
| --- | --- |
| **In City Residential/Commercial Rate** |  |
| Base – (minimum billing 3,000 gallons) | $36.17 |
| Per 1,000 gallons over 3,000 gallons and under 14,999 | $4.27 |
| Over 14,999 gallons | $4.96 |
|  |  |
| **Out of City** |  |
| Base – (minimum billing 3,000 gallons) | $72.34 |
| Per 1,000 gallons over 3,000 gallons | $8.54 |
| Over 14,999 gallon | $9.92 |
|  |  |
| **Raw Water** |  |
| Base – (minimum billing 3,000 gallons) | $35.35 |



|  |  |
| --- | --- |
| **In City** |  |
| Residential | $26.77 |
| Commercial | $27.00 |
| 0–10,000 Gals. of water usage | $27.00 |
| Each 1,000 gals. over minimum | $1.50 |
|  |  |
| **Out of City** |  |
| Residential | $53.54 |
| Commercial | $54.00 |
| 0–10,000 Gals. of water usage | $54.00 |
| Each 1,000 Gals. over minimum | $3.00 |

**Service Charges & Fees\*\* (These fees are doubled outside City Limits)**
---------------------------------------------------------------------------

|  |  |
| --- | --- |
| 3/4″ to 5/8″ Water Taps | $900.00 |
| 1″ Water Taps | $1,033.00 |
| 1 1/2″ Water Taps | Quoted on Request |
| 2″ or Greater Water Taps | Quoted on Request |
| Pavement Cuts | 200.00 minimum |
| Sewer Tap Permits | $600.00 |
| Late Charges (Water, Sewer & Garbage) | 20% |
| After Hours Service Call | $100.00 |
| Reconnect Fee | $50.00 |
| Deposits In City | $200.00+ |
| Commercial Deposits | $200.00+ |
| Return Check Fee | $25.00 |
| Tax Rate (Maintenance & Operation) | 1.17% |
| \*Hotel/Motel deposits are a minimum of $2,000.00 for services. |  |
| \*Nursing Home deposits are a minimum of $2,000.00 for services. |  |

Persons who reside in the City of Stanton and Martin County will not be charged a landfill fee for the disposal of any item connected with the cleanup and maintenance of a residence or grounds.

Contact Information
-------------------

* **City of Stanton**
  P O Box 370, Stanton
  TX 79782-0370
* [**Main Number:**
    
  432-756-3301](tel:4327563301)
* [**Water Department:**
    
  432-756-3302](tel:4327563302)
* [**Police Department:**
    
  432-756-3303](tel:4327563303)
* [For after-hour calls or emergencies, call the
  **Martin County Sheriff Office
    
  (432-756-3336)**
  to get in touch with the City personnel who are on-call.](tel:4327563336)
* [cityofstantontx@gmail.com](mailto:cityofstantontx@gmail.com%20%20)
* **The City of Stanton Attorney
  Paige Skehan**
  Ms. Skehan can be contacted at P O Box 81, Rankin, Texas, 79778
* Our offices are open from
  **Monday - Friday**
  8:00 am to 5:00 pm
  The offices are closed on most holidays.

* Contact Information

* **City of Stanton**
  P O Box 370, Stanton
  TX 79782-0370
* [**Main Number:**
    
  432-756-3301](tel:4327563301)
* [**Water Department:**
    
  432-756-3302](tel:4327563302)
* [**Police Department:**
    
  432-756-3303](tel:4327563303)
* [For after-hour calls or emergencies, call the
  **Martin County Sheriff Office
    
  (432-756-3336)**
  to get in touch with the City personnel who are on-call.](tel:4327563336)
* [cityofstantontx@gmail.com](mailto:cityofstantontx@gmail.com%20%20)
* **The City of Stanton Attorney
  Paige Skehan**
  Ms. Skehan can be contacted at P O Box 81, Rankin, Texas, 79778
